content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The usual reason for renaming is surname change in passport due to marriage / divorce / passport change/ incorrectly entered information during New Profile Request (NPR) creation. However, some exceptions are possible:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Removing a digit for the person, who has been rehired\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (i.e. the SAME person) – is allowed.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Removing a digit for the user, who is a different person\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is forbidden. Such requests must be rejected.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There might be also specific cases for updating display name for Contractors or people from acquired companies. Full list of possible renaming cases is available here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/XhWtFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Renaming personal EPAM account and profile\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study WI \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/download/attachments/378543447/EPM-HELP_WI_Account%20Renaming%20Procedure%20Description.doc?api=v2\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Account Renaming Procedure\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn how account are renamed in internal systems.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
